title: Marked Bumpless Pipedreams and Compatible Pairs
authors: Daoji Huang, Mark Shimozono, Tianyi Yu
abstract:
We construct a bijection between marked bumpless pipedreams with reverse
compatible pairs, which are in bijection with not-necessarily-reduced
pipedreams. This directly unifies various formulas for Grothendieck polynomials
in the literature. Our bijection is a generalization of a variant of the
bijection of Gao and Huang in the unmarked, reduced case.
